amendment.description: Amendment reduces the operating budget of the Office of the Secretary of Energy by $2.5 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 64 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Departmental Administration account under the Department of Energy by $2.5 million and increases the Spending Reduction Account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
